coupon.desc: Register and manage the coupons issued from both online or offline.

banner.subTitle: Inquire for a trial
banner.mainTitle: Time to experience the AR innovations

addCouponCode.title: Register Coupon
addCouponCode.label: Coupon Code
cautionContent: Coupons are used at the payment center when purchasing product plans or additional service plans.
One individual discount coupon is applied per product/service and the entire discount coupon cannot be applied on top of an individual discount coupon.
Coupons beyond the validity period cannot be registered or used.
Coupons cannot be used for commercial purposes traded and bought.

couponList.title: Coupon List
couponList.desc: Standby coupons can be used when purchasing product or service vouchers at the payment center.

message.registerFail: Failed to register the coupon please try again later
message.registerNotExist: The coupon with the number you entered does not exist.
message.registerExpired: Cannot register this coupon since the validity date has expired
message.registerOrUsedAlready: The coupon has already been used or registered
message.registerDayRistrict: You are limited to use the coupon tomorrow due to 5 consecutive wrong attemps.
message.useAlready: This coupon has already been used
message.useExpired: Cannot use this coupon since the validity date has expired

detailModal.title: Coupon Information
detailModal.usedDateDesc: Coupon can be applied when used during the valid date mentioned on the coupon.
detailModal.expireDateDesc: Coupons cannot be used after expiry date.
detailModal.targetDesc: Only the applicable coupon information is shown.
detailModal.desc: To use the coupon go to the payment center select the product or service voucher you want then apply the coupon and proceed with payment.
